tests.message: Title: Meridian - Perioperative Intelligence Platform, HPI textarea found

    2) <textarea rows="6" required="" id="issueDescription" placeholder="Please describe the issue in detail:??? What were you trying to do??? What happened instead??? What did you expect to happen??? Can you reproduce this issue??? Include any error messages if applicable"></textarea> aka get_by_placeholder("Please describe the issue in")
    3) <textarea rows="3" id="patientCase" placeholder="If relevant, provide anonymized patient details (age, conditions, procedure) that triggered the issue"></textarea> aka get_by_placeholder("If relevant, provide")
